generator.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

publications.title: Generation of two induced pluripotent stem cell lines from a 33-year-old central core disease patient with a heterozygous dominant c.14145_14156delCTACTGGGACA (p.Asn4715_Asp4718del) deletion in the RYR1 gene

donor.disease_description: Central core disease (CCD) is an inherited neuromuscular disorder characterised by central cores on muscle biopsy and clinical features of a congenital myopathy.

genomic_modifications.description: Central core disease (CCD) is an inherited neuromuscular disorder characterised by central cores on muscle biopsy and clinical features of a congenital myopathy.

ethics.institutional_HREC: Comité de Protection des Personnes (Est IV)
